title: can riot tell me what happend?
body:
i can't update, someting happend to LOLPatcherUx , "it said GetUnexpectedRunningProcessesString: Unexpected running processes: C:/Riot Games/League of Legends/RADS/projects/lol_patcher/releases/0.0.0.89/deploy/LoLPatcherUx.exe"  and "Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::FileExists: perform request failed
ERROR| Riot::RADS::Common::HTTPConnection::FileExists: Failed on /releases/live/solutions/league_client_sln/releases/releaselisting"
can riot tell how can i solve it ????

replies.body: Those kinds of RADS errors are typically caused when your OS is trying to block League from running due to not having the correct permissions in place. Check out this guide on setting up your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) and let me know if that helps!
